message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $15,000. I think it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, thanks for offering the product. $15,000 is quite steep for me, could you consider a lower price?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $15,000 represents the value I place on the product, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the benefits it offers.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you being willing to negotiate.  I'm still a ways off from that price point. Could you consider something closer to $7,000?
Hi Bob, I understand where you're coming from. To meet you halfway, I'd be willing to accept $10,000.  This is my final offer.
